Translations.Text: mcheasa del meanamnach nowknong kandabdai robsa trong mha utdongk utdam haey trong mean anoupheap leu avei teangoasa
kuchea mcheasa del ban bangkeut kar slab ning kar rsa daembi sak lbong puok anak tae anak namuoy knongchamnaom puok anak del ban sang ampeula cheangke? haey trong mha khlangpouke mha aphytosa

kuchea mcheasa del ban bangkeut mekh brapir chean tam rieb pi leu knea . anak( mou ham meat) minkheunh mean pheap chhkachhkang knong kar bangkeut robsa mcheasa mha sabborsa laey . dau che neah chaur anak kralek meul mdongtiet tae anak kheunh mean kanleng be reah sram der ryyte

banteabmk chaur anak kralek meul mdong haey mdongtiet choh kar meulkheunh noh nung vilotralb mokkan anak vinh knong sapheap ameasa ( daoy min meulkheunh mean pheap khveahkhat avei laey) haey vea mean pheap nueyoht bamphot

haey chea karpit nasa yeung ban tobteng loma mekh chean kraom daoy hvaung tara . haey yeung ban bangkeut vea( hvaung tara)daembi b ne d nh puok shai t n . haey yeung ban riebcham samreab puokvea nouv tearounakamm nei phleung nork del cheh santhosanthow
haey samreab puok del brachheang nung mcheasa robsa puokke ku tearounakamm nei nork cheu han nam del chea kanleng vilotralb da akrak bamphot
nowpel del puokke trauv ban ke kroveng chaul tow knong vea( nork) puokke banlyy samrek yeang khlang khn del vea kampoungte pouhkanhchrol

vea staerte bek khchatkhchay daoysaarte kamhoeng( champoh puok del brachheang) . real pel del krom muoy trauv ban ke kroveng chaul tow knong vea anakyeam robsa vea ban suor tow puokke tha tae anak dasatuen promean( anakneasar) minban mokadl puok anak te ryy

puokke ban chhlaey tha mean pitabrakd men . anak dasatuen promean pitchea ban mokadl puok yeung men bo nde puok yeung ban bde- se th . haey puok yeung ban niyeay tha a l laoh minban banhchouh avei b ndi ch mk laey . puok anak(anakneasar ning anak ruom chomnue cheamuoy keat) kmeanoavei krawpi sthet knong pheap v nge v ng da sen chhngay noh laey
puokke ban niyeay( towkean anakyeam nork) tiet tha brasenbae puok yeung thleab ban sdab( anakneasar) ryy puok yeung ban svengoyl noh puok yeung pitchea min sthet knong puok nork laey
pelnoh puokke ban ttuoloskal nouv babakamm robsa puokke . dau che neah kar khleatachhngay( pi kdei me tda krounea robsa a l laoh noh) ku samreab puok thanonork
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del kaotakhlach mcheasa robsa puokke daoy athrkambang puokke nung ttuol ban nouv kar aphytosa ning phalbony da thomtheng
haey chaur puok anak leakbang nouv peakyasaamdei robsa puok anak ryy puok anak leatatradeang vea choh pitabrakd nasa trong doeng bamphot nouv avei del mean nowknong chetd
tae mcheasa del ban bangkeut( avei teangoasa) minban doeng te ryy? haey trong kuchea anak del tnphlon doeng chruotachreab bamphot

trong chea anak del ban bangkeut phendei aoy mean pheap ngeayosruol samreab puok anak . dau che neah chaur puok anak thveudamnaer krobtisati now leu vea haey chaur puok anak briphok ampi leaphosakkar robsa trong choh . haey kar rsa laengvinh( daembi chomnoumchomreah) ku chhpaohtow rk trong temuoyokt
tae puok anak kitthea mean sovotthephap pi mcheasa del now leumekh knongokarnei del trong nung thveu aoy phendei sraub yk puok anak khn del vea kampoung ronhchuoy ryy

ryy muoy puok anak kitthea mean sovotthephap pi mcheasa del now leu mekh knongokarnei del trong nung banhchoun pyouh thm towleu puok anak ryy? dau che neah puok anak nung doeng tha tae karopromean robsa yeung yeang dauch me d ch
haey chea karpit nasa puok chomnean moun puokke kaban bdeseth ( nung banda anakneasar) der . dau che neah tae tearounakamm robsa yeung(champoh puokke) yeang dauch me d ch

tae puokke minban samlung meul satv del haer tradeangoslab ning kdaob slab robsa puokvea now pi leu puokke te ryy? kmean anaknea ach tr puokvea( min aoy thleak) krawpi mcheasa da mha sabborsa noh laey . pitabrakd nasa trong mha kheunh nouv avei teangoasa

tae mean anaknea del chea baksaapuok robsa puok anak ach chuoy puok anak krawpi mcheasa da mha sabborsa noh? puok del kmean chomnue kmeanoavei krawpi sthetnow knong karbaokabrasa( robsa shai t n) noh laey

tae mean anaknea del chea anak phdal leaphosakkar dl puok anak brasenbae trong phdach leaphosakkar robsa trong noh? phtoytowvinh puok ke nowte sthetnow knong pheap chchesarungrousa ning kech chenhpi karpit ddel
dau che neah tae anak del daer aon moukh robsa ke( mindoeng tisadaw) ttuol ban kar changaoulobangheanh cheang ryy muoy anak del daer trang( doeng tisa daw chbasaleasa) now leu meakra da troemotrauv

chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha trong chea anak del ban bangkeut puok anak haey trong ban thveu aoy puok anakasdab lyy ning meulkheunh ning mean behdaung( cheh kitpichearna) . avei del puok anak thleng amnr- koun ku techtuoch bamphot
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha trong temuoyokt kuchea anak del bangkeut puok anak aoy meanchivit now leu phendei haey puok anak nung trauv bramoulophdom towkean trong vinh( now thngai barlok)
haey puokke( puok brachheang) niyeay tha tae thngai sanyea nih ( barlok) nowpel na? brasenbae puok anakchea anak niyeaypit men noh
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha pitabrakd nasa kar doeng ( pi thngai barlok) ku meante a l laoh . haey chea karpit nasa khnhom kreante chea anak dasatuen promean da chbasaleasa bonnaoh

dau che neah nowpel puokke( puok brachheang) bankheunh tearounakamm now chit puokke tukmoukh robsa puok del brachheang noh brecha khmaw(daoy kdei pruoybaromph) . haey mean ke niyeay tha nih chea avei del puok anak thleab ban teamtear vea

chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha chaur puok anak brab khnhom mk brasenbae a l laoh ban thveu aoy khnhom ning anak del ruom chomnue cheamuoy khnhom slab ryy trong anet sraleanh puok yeung tae mean anaknea del ach karpar puok del brachheang ampi tearounakamm da sen chhucheab ban noh

chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha trong chea mcheasa mha sabborsa del puok yeung mean chomnue leu trong . haey champoh trong temuoyokt del puok yeung brakl kar touk chetd . haey puok anak nung doeng tha tae anak na del sthet knong pheap v nge v ng da chbasaleasa noh
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha chaur puok anak brab khnhom mk brasenbae tukphoek robsa puok anak ban ringosnguot tae mean anaknea ach noam braphp tuk mk aoy puok anak vinh
noun . a l laoh sbath nung slab baka ning avei del puokke ( mea la ai kat ning mnoussa lok) kampoung sarser
daoysaarte nie k meat nei mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat)noh anak minmen chea anak del vikalochrit laey
haey pitabrakd nasa anak nung ttuol ban phalbony daoy kmean ti b pea ch b laey
haey pitabrakd nasa anak mean a td chrit da brapei bamphot
dau che neah anak( mou ham am meat) nung kheunh haey puokke( puok kmean chomnue) ka nung kheunh der
tae anaknea knongchamnaom puok anakchea mnoussaavikl chrit noh

pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa anak trong doeng bamphot champoh anak del ban v nge v ng chenhpi meakra robsa trong haey trong ka doeng bamphot der champoh banda anak del ttuol ban nouv kar changaoulobangheanh
dau che neah chaur anak kom thveuteam puok del bdeseth( nung ayeat ning anakneasar robsa yeung) aoy saoh
puokke sraleanh penh chetd yeang khlang brasenbae anak( mou ham meat)ekpheap haey puokke ka ekpheap vinh der
haey chaur anak kom thveuteam puok del sbath bampean del thaok teab bamphot noh aoy saoh
ku anak del chaul chetd bri ha ke ri·üç dke ning daer chakrouk ke
anak del kamnanh knong phlauv la ning chaul chetd bampean ning chaul chetd br pru td babakamm
ke chea mnoussa del brachheang yeang khlang leusa pi nih tiet ke chea mnoussa khorkhow bamphot
daoysaarte ke meanotropy sa mb tde ning kaun cheachraen
nowpel del mean ke sautr ayeat robsa yeung aoy ke sdab ke bercha niyeay tha nih kreante chea ruengnitean robsa anak chomnean moun bonnaoh
yeung nung dak sanhnhea chamnam leu chramouh robsa ke cheaminkhan

pitabrakd nasa yeung ban sakalbong puokke( puok mou sh- ri ki n mea kkah) dauchdel yeung ban sakalbong champoh puok del mean chamkar cheachraen der khn del puokke ban sbath tha puokke pitchea nung bramoul phaldamnam nowpel prukaproheam
daoy puokke min niyeay tha e n sha a l laoh (brasen bae a l laoh mean chetnea) laey
pelnoh phleung muoy ban chabcheh chamkar noh tam batobanhchea nei mcheasa robsa anak khn del puokke dek ln lk now peloyb
dau che neah chamkar noh kaban klaycha pnrkhmaw dauchchea yb del ngngutsaunyosong
pelnoh puokke ban srekhaw knea nowpel prukaprolum tha
chaur puok anak thveudamnaer towkean chamkar robsa puok anak choh brasen bae puok anak chng bramoul phl noh
pelnoh puokke ka neaknea thveudamnaer( chhpaohtow chamkar)daoy puokke niyeay knea tech tha
daembi komaoy anak kreikr na mneak chaul tow knong chamkar noh tow rk anak now thngainih
haey puokke sraut damnaer tangpi prolum( towkean chamkar noh) knong kolbamnng reareang anak kreikr min aoy chaul tow knong chamkar noh daoy puokke kit tha puokke meanolotthopheap thveu dauchnaoh
haey nowpel del puokke bankheunh chamkar noh puokke kaban pol tha pitabrakd nasa puok yeung v nge v ng phlauv haey
phtoytowvinh puok yeung te trauv ban ke reareang( ampi kar bramoul phl) noh

anak del mean brachnha la cheangke knongchamnaom puok noh ban niyeay tha tae khnhom minban niyeay cheamuoy puok anak te ryy tha hetoavei ban puok anak min niyeay tha e n sha a l laoh( brasenbae a l laoh mean chetnea)
puokke ban niyeay tha ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung mha saat sam. pitabrakd nasa puok yeung kuchea puok del thleab ban bampean
banteabmk puokke ban daertow rokaknea daoy sdeibantosa knea towvinhtowmk
puokke ban niyeay tha ao vineasa a nd reay haey puok yeung. pitabrakd nasa puok yeung kuchea puok del bampean

sangkhumtha mcheasa robsa puok yeung nung chomnuosa aoy puok yeung vinh nouv brakear la cheang chamkar noh towtiet . pitabrakd nasa puok yeung sangkhum tow champoh mcheasa robsa yeung temuoyokt tha nung ttuol bankar aphytosa
noh kreante chea tearounakamm( lokey)bonnaoh te tearounakamm now thngai barlok vinh pitchea thngonthngor cheang nih towtiet brasenbae puokke ban doeng
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh ku ttuol ban thansuokr na ai m pi mcheasa robsa puokke cheaminkhan
dau che neah tae aoy yeung chattouk banda anak mou slei m( del korp tam batobanhchea robsa yeung) dauch puok del br pru td babakamm ryy
tae puok anak mean banhhea avei tae puok anak katsechakdei yeangdauch me d ch
ryy muoy anak mean kompir muoy del puok anak kampoungte seksaa vea
(bae dau che neah men) pitabrakd nasa nowknong noh puok anak pitchea mean avei del puok anak ach chreusareusa samreab puok anak ban
ryy muoy puok anak mean peaky samboth promoprieng muoy ampi yeung rhautadl thngai barlok del anak pitchea ach katsechakdei tam avei del puok anak chng ryy
chaur anak( mou ham meat) suor puokke tha tae anaknea mneak knong chamnaom puokke chea anakattuol khosatrauv champoh rueng katsechakdei noh
ryy muoy puokke mean preah neanea( phe sa ng pi a l laoh)? ( brasenbae mean men) dau che neah chaur aoy puokke noam preah neanea robsa puokke noh mk brasenbae puokke chea puok del troemotrauv men noh
now thngai del kamphuoncheung trauv ke b po chnh haey puokke ( mnoussa lok) trauv ke ampeavneav aoy saou chout te puokke( puok brachheang) min ach saou chout ban laey

phnek robsa puokke tomleak choh khn del kar lombak krob dandab puokke . haey chea karpit nasa puokke thleab trauv ban ke ampeav neav aoy saou chout( te puokke minban saou chout laey) khn del puokke mean sokhpheap la noh

dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) touk kechchakar noh aoy yeung haey anaknea del bdeseth nung peakyasaamdei nih( kompir kuor an) yeung nung teanh yk puokke b ndi ch mdong ( tow rk pheap a nd reay) daoy puokke min doengokhluon laey
haey yeung ponyearpel samreab puokke . pitabrakd nasa lbichakl robsa yeung ku khlangokla bamphot
tae anak( mou ham meat) som kamrei pi puokke( champoh kar ampeav neav robsa anak) ruochamk puokke trauv ttuolobantouk thngonthngor pi kar chompeak bamnol( robsa anak) noh ryy
ryy muoy puokke doengpi rueng athrkambang haey puokke kttra vea touk( samreab brab dl mnoussa lok) ryy

dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) atthmot champoh chbab nei mcheasa robsa anak haey chaur anak kom thveu dauch anak del nowknong poh trei hou t ( you nou sa) nowpel del keat ban buongsuong som( pi mcheasa robsa keat) khn del keat porpenh daoy kdei toukkh pruoy
brasenbae kmean nie k meat pi mcheasa robsa keat towdl keat te noh keat pitchea nung trauv ke baohbngchaol now e tiveal del kmean avei saoh khn del keat trauv ke sdeibantosa
kraoyomk mcheasa robsa keat ban chreusareusa keat( chea anak noam sar) promteang thveu aoy keat sthet knongchamnaom anak del sang ampeu la troemotrauv

haey pitabrakd nasa puok del kmean chomnue staerte thveu aoy anak mean krohthnak daoysaarte kar samlung meul robsa puokke now pel del puokke ban sdablyy kompir kuor an haey puokke themtang niyeay tha pitabrakd nasa keat kuchea mnoussaavikl chrit
haey kompir kuor an kmeanoavei krawpi kar romluk dl piphp teangoasa noh laey
thngai barlok ( chea thngai del nung kaetlaeng pitabrakd)
avei tow chea thngai barlok noh
haey avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha vea chea thngai barlok noh
krom sa moud ning a d ban bdeseth nung thngai barlok
rie krom sa moud puokke trauv ban ke bamphlanh daoy saamleng srek muoy yeang khlang
haey chamnek e krom a d vinh puokke trauv ban ke bamphlanh daoy khyalpyouh da trachak bamphot

del trong ban banhchea vea aoy bk baok puokke yeang khlang rypel brapir yb ning brabei thngai cheab knea . ruochamk anak nung kheunh krom noh duol slab nowpel noh puokke hakdauchchea daem lmeu del rlom
dau che neah tae anak kheunh puokke now sesasal der ryyte
haey hvie r aon ning anak del pimoun ke ning krom lout sotth te ban br pru td babakamm
haey puokke themtang ban brachheang nung anakneasar nei mcheasa robsa puokke tiet phng . dau che neah trong ban thveutearounakamm puokke nouv tearounakamm muoy da thngonthngor
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban doek puok anak now leu saampow now pel del tukchomnn laeng huosa kamrit
daembi yeung touk vea samreab puok anak thveuchea merien muoy ning trachiek del ban sdablyy yk chetd toukdeak champoh vea
haey nowpel del tre trauv ban ke phlom leuktimuoy
haey phendei ning phnom trauv ban ke leuk chenh( pi tikanleng robsa vea) ruoch vea teangpir ka bek khe t ch khtei temdong
thngai noh haey kuchea thngai barlok ban kaetlaeng
haey mekh kaban bek khe t ch khtei haey now thngai noh vea klay tow chea tn
haey mea la ai kat del now krob chroung nei mekh . haey now thngai noh mean mea la ai kat brabei roub tr a r sh nei mcheasa robsa anak now pi leu puokke
now thngai noh puok anak nung trauv ke neamk bangheanh( now champoh moukh a l laoh) daoy kmean pheap athrkambang namuoy robsa puok anak ach leakbang ban laey
rie anaknea haey del trauv ban ke brakl sievphowkamnt heto robsa ke now daisdam robsa ke noh ke nung niyeay( towkeanknea robsa ke) tha chaur puok anak yk sievphow kamntheto robsakhnhom tow an choh
pitabrakd nasa khnhom chuecheak yeang chbasa tha khnhom pitchea nung ttuol ban phalbony robsakhnhom dauchnih
haey ke nung rsanow daoy kdei keab chetd cheatibamphot
nowknong thansuokr da khpangkhpasa
phlechheu krob braphet now chit ke bamphot
chaur puok anak briphok ning phoek daoy rikreay daoysaarte avei del puok anak thleab ban sang kanlongomk nowknong lokey choh

rie anaknea haey delke ban brakl nouv sievphowkamnt heto robsa ke now dai che v ng robsa ke ke nung niyeay tha ao anichchea khluonokhnhom aey. sangkhumtha khnhom min trauv ke brakl sievphow kamntheto robsakhnhom nih laey
haey khnhom ka mintean doeng der tha avei tow chea lotthophl robsakhnhom noh
ao anichchea. sangkhumtha sechakdeislab( robsakhnhom ko n ng lokey) ban b pea ch b avei teangoasa
tropy sa mb tde robsakhnhom kmean brayoch avei dl khnhom laey
amnach robsakhnhom kaban batbng pi khnhom der
(mean ke niyeay towkean anakyeam tvear nork tha) chaur anak chab chn nih ruoch dak chravak(k ning daicheung) ke
banteabmk baoh ke chaul knong phleung nork choh
banteabmk chaur puok anak daot ke nung chravak del mean braveng robsa vea chetseb hatth choh
pitabrakd nasa ke minothleab mean chomnue leu a l laoh da mha thomtheng laey
haey ke min del chomrounh knea leu kar phdal chamneiahar dl anak kreikr laey
dau che neah kmean mi td phokde na chuoy ke laey now thngainih(thngai barlok)
haeyka kmean chamneiahar na krawpi khtohchheam
del kmean anaknea sai vea krawpi puok br pru td babakamm laey
yeung sbath nung avei del puok anak kheunh
ning avei del puok anak minkheunh tha
pitabrakd nasa vea( kompir kuor an) pitchea peakyapech robsa a l laoh del sautr daoy anakneasar da mha thkomthkaeng
haey vea minmen chea peakyapech robsa anak kvi laey . te avei del puok anak chue noh ku techtuoch bamphot
haeyka minmen chea peakyapech robsa krouteay der . te avei del puok anak nukkheunh noh ku techtuoch bamphot
kompir kuor an kuchea kar banhchouh mk pi mcheasa krobkrong nei piphp teangoasa
haey brasenbae ke( mou ham meat) banthem banthoy peakyasaamdei khleah leu peakyasaamdei robsa yeung noh
yeung nung phdantatosa ke daoy daisdam robsa yeung
banteabmk yeung pitchea nung kat sarsaichham behdaung robsa ke cheaminkhan
haey kmean anaknea mneak knongchamnaom puok anak ach reareang vea ( kar daktosa robsa yeung) ban laey
haey pitabrakd nasa vea( kompir kuor an) kuchea kar romluk dl banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh
haey pitabrakd nasa yeung doeng tha knongchamnaom puok anak pitchea mean anak del bdeseth( nung kompir kuor an)
haey pit bra dk nasa vea( kompir kuor an) kuchea kar saok sday yeang khlang champoh puok del kmean chomnue( now thngai barlok)
haey pitabrakd nasa vea kuchea karpit yeang cheaksdeng
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) leukatamkeung neam nei mcheasa robsa anak da mha utdongk utdam
anak som mneak( anak kmean chomnue) ban buongsuong som aoy tearounakamm kaetlaeng
champoh puok del kmean chomnue . kmean anaknea mneak ach karpar ke
pi( tearounakamm) a l laoh del chea mcheasa nei phlauv laeng towleu mekh
del mea la ai kat ning chi pri l laeng towkean trong knong muoy thngai del rypel robsa vea chamnuon haseb pean chhnam laey
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) atthmot nouv kar atthmot muoy da la choh
pitabrakd nasa puokke( puok kmean chomnue) kheunh tearounakamm now chhngay bamphot
te yeung kheunh vea now chitabangkeuy
now thngai del mekh nung klay dauchchea lohtheato kampoung rleay
haey phnom ka klay dauchchea romosatv baeng prongopreat
(now thngai noh) kmean mi td ph ke d na suorsokhtoukkh mi td ph ke dna laey
tohbeicha puokke trauv ke aoy kheunh knea kadaoy . anaksaeang ampeubeab mean bamnng lohkhluon aoy ruochphot pi tearounakamm now thngai noh daoy kaunchaw robsa ke
ning phriyea ning bangobaaun robsa ke
ning krom kruosaear sach sar lohet robsa ke del phdal ti chomrk dl ke
ning anak del now leu phendei teangoasa banteabmk sangkroh ke aoy phot pi tearounakamm
min dauchnaoh te. pitabrakd nasa vea kuchea phleung nork del cheh santhosanthow
del vea bakasbek kbal ( ning khluonobran)
vea( nork) srekhaw anak del ban berokhnang ning kech chenh ( pi meakra troemotrauv)
ning ban bramoul( tropy sa mb tde) ruoch leak touk( min brichcheak tean)
pitabrakd nasa mnoussa lok trauv ban ke bangkeut laeng daoy kmean kar atthmot laey
daoy ke mean kdei pruoybaromph nowpel del krohakrak ban kaetlaeng champoh ke
haey ke bercha kamnanh nowpel delke ban ttuol ban phl la( meanotropy sa mb tde)
leuklengte banda anak del brate b tde sa la t bonnaoh
del puokke brakean khchab nung kar brate b tde sa la t robsa ke cheanichch
ning banda anak del tropy sa mb tde robsa puokke ku mean setthi ( mean chamnek) del trauv ban ke kamnt( aoy brichcheak pheaktean)
samreab anakakr del han som ning anakakr del min han som
ning banda anak del chuecheak leu thngai chomnoumchomreah( thngai barlok)
ning banda anak del kaotakhlach tearounakamm nei mcheasa robsa puokke
pitabrakd nasa tearounakamm nei mcheasa robsa puokke ku kmean anaknea mneak mean sovotthephap laey
ning banda anak del ban theroksaa bradeab phet robsa puokke ( pi ampeu hsai na)
leuklengte champoh phriyea robsa puokke ning khnhom bamreu srei dachthlai del now kraom karokrobkrong robsa puokke bonnaoh . haey pitabrakd nasa puokke min trauv ban ke yk tosapei laey
anaknea haey del ban svengork kar te r k traaeal krawpi (braponth ning khnhom bamreu dachthlai)noh puok teangnoh haey kuchea puok del ban lmeusa( nung bt b nhnh tde robsa a l laoh)
haey banda anak del theroksaa nouv pheap smaohtrang ning kar sanyea robsa puokke
ning banda anak del brakean khchab( daoy you tde thmr) knong kar thveusaeaksaei robsa puokke
haeyning banda anak del theroksaa nouv kar brate b tde sa lat robsa puokke
anak teangnoh haey kuchea anak del trauv ke leukatamkeung now knong thansuokr
tae hetoaveibeanchea puok kmean chomnue branhab branhal chhpaohtow kan anak
teang khangosdam ning khangchevng chea krom dau che neah
tae real bokkol knongchamnaom puokke mean bamnng chaul than suokr na ai m ryy
min dauchnaoh te. pitabrakd nasa yeung ban bangkeut puokke ampi avei del puokke ban doeng srab( tukkeam)

yeung sbath nung mcheasa krobkrong( a l laoh sbath nung khluoneng) kanleng del preahatity ning preah chnt reah ning kanleng del preahatity ning preah chnt lich tha pitabrakd nasa yeung kuchea anak del mean anoupheap
leu kar chomnuosa krom phe sa ng del la cheang puokke towtiet haey kmean anaknea mneak ach yokachhneah yeung ban laey

dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) bandaoy aoy puokke lichalng ( knong pheap v nge v ng) ning lengsaech rhautadl puokke chuobnung thngai robsa puokke del trauv ke sanyea thveutearounakamm( now thngai barlok) choh
ku now thngai del puokke chenhpi phnaur yeang luen brieb dauchchea puokke chhpaoh towkean roubsaamnak del puokke ban bangkeut daembi korp sakkar( nowknong lokey)
phnek robsa puokke tomleak choh khn del kar lombak krobadandab puokke . noh kuchea thngai del puokke trauv ban ke sanyea
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban banhchoun nuo h towkean krom robsa ke( daoy banhchea tha) chaur anak dasatuen promean krom robsa anak moun nung tearounakamm da chhucheab thleak mk leu puokke
ke( nuo h) ban pol tha ao krom robsakhnhom. pitabrakd nasa khnhom chea anak dasatuen promean da pitabrakd samreab puok anak
chaur puok anak korp sakkar champoh a l laoh ning kaotakhlach trong haeyning brate b tde tam khnhom

trong nung aphytosa dl puok anak nouv real babakamm robsa puok anak haey trong nung ponyearpel aoy puok anak( mean ayouveng)rhaut dlpel muoy delke ban kamnt . pitabrakd nasa karkamnt robsa a l laoh kalna vea mokadl ku ke min ponyearpel laey brasenbae puok anak ban doeng
ke( nuo h) ban pol tha ao mcheasa robsakhnhom. pitabrakd nasa khnhom ban ampeavneav krom robsakhnhom( aoy towkean pheap mean chomnue)teangoyb teang thngai
te kar ampeavneav robsakhnhom min banthem avei dl puokke laey ku mean te thveu aoy puokke rtkech themtiet bonnaoh

haey pit bra dk nasa real pel del khnhom ampeavneav puokke daembi trong nung aphytosa dl puokke noh puokke bercha yk mream dai robsa puokke nhok trachiek robsa puokke ning yk saamliekbampeak robsa puokke krob leu moukh themtang ban b nd kar brachheang ning kraeut kr tm yeang khlang tiet phng
banteabmk khnhom pitchea ban ampeavneav puokke daoychamh r
kraoyomk khnhom pitchea ban brakeasabrab puokke chea satharn ning( chuonkal) daoy sngiemosngat
ruochamk khnhom ban pol tha chaur puok anak som aphytosa pi mcheasa robsa puok anak pitabrakd nasa trong chea anak aphytosa bamphot
trong nung banhchouh tukaphlieng cheachraen mk aoy puok anak
haey trong nung banthem tropy sa mb tde ning kaunchaw cheachraen dl puok anak ning bratan chamkar damnam cheachraen aoy puok anak haeyka bratan t ne l cheachraen aoy puok anak der
tae hetoaveibeanchea puok anak min kaotakhlach pheap thkomthkaeng robsa a l laoh
daoy trong pitchea ban bangkeut puok anakchea damnak ( pi tuk kam rhaut klaycha roubreang penhlenh) noh
tae anak min bankheunh te tha tae a l laoh ban bangkeut mekh brapir chean tam rieb leu knea
haey trong ban bangkeut preah chnt chea ponlu ning ban bangkeut preahatity chea changkieng nowknong vea( mekh) yeang dauch me d ch khleah
haey a l laoh ban bangkeut theato daem robsa puok anak ampi dei
banteabmk trong nung thveu aoy anak vilotralb tow knong dei vinh haey trong ka b po ch nh puok anak pi vea vinh phng der( now thngai barlok)
haey a l laoh ban bangkeut phendei chea kamreal samreab puok anak
daembi aoy puok anak ach thveudamnaer leu vea tamophlauv cheachraen del toulomtouleay

nuo h ban pol tha ao mcheasa robsakhnhom. pitabrakd nasa puok ke ban brachheang nung khnhom themtang ban thveuteam anak del tropy sa mb tde robsa ke ning kaunchaw robsa ke minban banthem avei dl ke krawpi pheap khat bng tiet phng
haey puokke ban riebcham lbichakl muoy da thom
haey puokke ban niyeay( towkean knea ke) tha chaur puok anak kom baohbng preah neanea robsa puok anak ning kom baohbng preah vea d ning saouvea k ning yea hkausa ning yea aouk ning na sa aoy saoh
haey chea karpit nasa preah teangnoh ban thveu aoy mnoussa cheachraen v nge v ng . saum trong me tda kom banthem avei dl puok del bampean kraw pi pheap v nge v ng ei v
daoysaarte babakamm teanglay robsa puokke puokke trauv ban ke ponlich( knong tukchomnn) ruoch trauv ban ke banhchoul tow knong nork . haey puokke kmean anaknea chuoy krawpi a l laoh laey
nuo h ban pol tha ao mcheasa robsakhnhom. saum trong me tda kom touk aoy puok kmean chomnue na mneak rsanow leu phendei nih ei v

pitabrakd nasa brasenbae trong touk chivit aoy puokke puokke nung thveu aoy khnhom robsa trong v nge v ng cheaminkhan . haey puokke min bangkeut kraw pi kaun del akrak ning brachheang( nung trong) noh laey

ao mcheasa robsakhnhom. saum trong me tda aphytosa dl khnhom ning aupoukamdeay robsakhnhom ning anak del ban chaul knong phteah robsakhnhom daoyman chomnue( nung trong) ning banda anak del mean chomnue brosasrei phng . haey saum trong me tda kom banthem avei dl puok del bampean krawpi pheap vineasa ei v

chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha khnhom trauv ban ke phdal vea hi aoy doeng tha pitabrakd nasa mean chin muoy krom ban sdab( khnhom sautr kompir kuor an) . haey puokke ban niyeayobrab knea tha pitabrakd nasa puok yeung ban sdab kar sautr kompir kuor an muoy da aschary
del vea changaoulobangheanh tow rk meakra da troemotrauv ruoch puok yeung ka mean chomnue leu vea . haey puok yeung min korp sakkar champoh anaknea mneak ruom cheamuoy mcheasa robsa puok yeung laey
haey pitabrakd nasa anoupheap nei mcheasa robsa puok yeung mha khpangkhpasa . trong kmean phriyea ning kmean botr laey
haey pitabrakd nasa anak del lngongkhlaw knongchamnaom puok yeung( ai pli sa) thleab niyeay chaotobrakean champoh a l laoh nouv peaky saamdei huosaheto
haey pitabrakd nasa puok yeung ban kitthea mnoussaalok ning chin nung min niyeay chaotobrakean champoh a l laoh nouv peakyasaamdei phout kohk laey

haey pitabrakd nasa borsa muoy krom knongchamnaom mnoussa lok ban som pi borsa chin muoychamnuon aoy karpar( puokke ampi brakear akrak) . bo nde chin teangnoh ri t te banthem babakamm dl puokke themtiet
haey pitabrakd nasa puokke( mnoussa kmean chomnue) ban kit dauchdel puok anak( chin kmean chomnue) ban kit der tha a l laoh nung min thveu aoy anaknea mneak rsa laengvinh mdongtiet laey

haey pitabrakd nasa puok yeung( chin) ban pyeayeam laeng tow leumekh( daembi sdab rueng athrkambang) ruoch yeung ban chuobabrateah now tinoh porpenh tow daoy anak karpar( mea la ai kat) da rungmoam ning mean phkay cheachraen( samreab banh puok shai t n)

haey pitabrakd nasa puok yeung thleab ban angkouy nowkanleng muoychamnuon now leumekh daembi sdab ruengreav phe sa ng . bo nde ilauvnih ( kraoypi mou ham meat klaycha anakneasar) anaknea haey pyeayeam sdab ruengreav noh ke pitchea chuobabrateah nung phkay del now karpar ( tam banh ke) cheaminkhan

haey pitabrakd nasa puok yeung minban doeng te tha (kar hamkhat min aoy sdab ruengreav now leumekh noh) tae a l laoh chng thveutearounakamm anak del now leu phendei ryy muoy ka mcheasa robsa ke chng changaoulobangheanh meakra troemotrauv dl puokke

haey pitabrakd nasa knongchamnaom puok yeung( chin)mean anakakhleah chea anak del sang ampeula troemotrauv( mean chomnue) ning mean anak khleahtiet phtoypi noh( kmean chomnue) . puok yeung mean meakra khosa knea
haey pitabrakd nasa puok yeung ban kit tha puok yeung min ach kech pi( tearounakamm) a l laoh now leu phendei ning min ach kech pi trong haoh tow leumekh ban laey

haey pitabrakd nasa nowpel del puok yeung ban sdab lyy nouv kar changaoulobangheanh( kompir kuor an) puok yeung ka mean chomnue leu vea . anaknea haey del chue leu mcheasa robsa ke ku ke min khlach khveah phalbony haeyka min khlach ke banthem babakamm der

haey pitabrakd nasa nowknongchamnaom puok yeung mean anakakhleah chea mou slei m ning anak khleahtiet chea anak bampean . anaknea haeydel ban brate b tde tam sasanea ai slam anak teangnoh chea anak del mean bamnng tow rk meakra da troemotrauv
rie puok del bampean vinh puokke kuchea osa samreab dot nowknong nork cheu han nam
haey pitabrakd nasa brasenbae puokke( mnoussaalok ning chin) sthetnow leu meakra da troemotrauv noh yeung pitchea nung phdal aoy puok ke nouv tukaphlieng( ning phdal leaphosakkar) yeang chraen
daembi yeung nung sakalbong puokke nung vea . anaknea haey del kech chenhpi kar romluk champoh mcheasa robsa ke noh trong pitchea banhchoul ke tow knong tearounakamm da thngonthngor
haey pitabrakd nasa mea sche t( vihear) kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh . dau che neah chaur puok anak kom buongsuong som anaknea mneak ruom chea muoy a l laoh aoy saoh

haey pitabrakd nasa nowpel del khnhom robsa a l laoh mneak( mou ham meat) kraokachhr laeng daembi thvayobangkoum noh puokke ( chin) muoy krom staerte brachrietaknea tow rk ke( daembi sdab ke sautr kompir kuor an)
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha pitabrakd nasa khnhom korp sakkar champoh mcheasa robsakhnhom temuoyokt haey khnhom min korp sakkar anaknea mneak ruom cheamuoynung trong laey
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha pitabrakd nasa khnhom kmean lotthopheap karpar puok anak pi krohthnak haeyka kmean lotthopheap phdal phalobrayoch dl puok anak der
chaur anak pol tha pitabrakd nasa kmean anaknea mneak ach chuoyosangkroh khnhom aoy ruochphot pi tearounakamm robsa a l laoh ban laey haey khnhom ka kmean kanleng chrokkaon na phe sa ng pi trong der

bo nde khnhom kreante chea anak phsaapvophsaeay batobanhchea pi a l laoh ning sar robsa trong tebonnaoh . anaknea haey brachheang nung a l laoh ning anakneasar robsa trong noh pitabrakd nasa samreab ke ku nork cheu han nam daoy puokke sthetnow ko n ng noh chea amt

louh nowpel del puokke( puok kmean chomnue) bankheunh nouv avei ( tearounakamm) del puokke trauv ke sanyea noh puokke nung doeng tha tae anak na mean chomnuoy khsaaoy cheangke ning mean baksaapuok tech cheangke

chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha khnhom mindoeng te tha tae tearounakamm delke sanyea champoh puok anak noh nung kaetlaeng knong pel chab nih ryyka mcheasa robsakhnhom ponyearpel vea aoy youroangveng
trong chea mcheasa del doeng nouv brakear athrkambang haey trong min leatatradeang athrkambang robsa trong aoy norna mneak kheunh laey
leuklengte anaknea del trong chreusareusa ke thveuchea anaknoam sar bonnaoh . pitabrakd nasa trong ban chattang anakyeam( mea- la ai kat) now khangmoukh ke( anakneasar) ning now khangokraoy ke
daembi trong doeng tha puokke pitchea ban phdal sar nei mcheasa robsa puokke haey trong doeng chruotachreab nouv avei del puokke mean haey trong doeng chamnuon krob avei teangoasa
ao anak del dandabphuoy( mou ham meat)
chaur anak kraok now peloyb( daembi sa la t) leuklengte b ndi ch b nduo ch bonnaoh( daembi samreak)
peakkandal yb ryy tech cheang nih b ndi ch
ryy chraenchang peakkandal yb b ndi ch . haey chaur anak sautr kompir kuor an tambebabt yut ning aoy chbasaleasa
pitabrakd nasa yeung nung banhchouh aoy anak nouv kompir kuor an da utdongk utdam( del mean chbab krobbebyeang)
pitabrakd nasa kar kraok now peloyb( daembi thvayobangkoum) noh ku vea thveu aoy chetd mean pheap nungonr ning thveu aoy kar sautr kompir kuor an mean pheap troemotrauv cheang pelothngai
pitabrakd nasa samreab anak( mou ham meat) nowpel thngai ku mean karngear cheachraen
haey chaur anak romluk neam nei mcheasa robsa anak ning trauv korp sakkar champoh trong daoy chetd smaoh sa

a l laoh chea mcheasa nei tisakheangkaet ning tisakheanglich del kmean mcheasa na phe sa ng trauv korp sakkar da pitabrakd krawpi trong laey . dau che neah chaur anak yk trong thveuchea anak keapear choh
haey chaur anak atthmot towleu avei del puokke niyeayakrak ( champoh anak) ning trauv chakchenh aoy chhngay pi puokke knong lokkhan muoy da laobrapei
haey chaur anak( mou ham meat) touk aoy yeung chatcheng cheamuoy puok del brachheang del mean ke tde ysa ning touk pel aoy puokke b ndich sen choh
pitabrakd nasa ( now thngai barlok) yeung mean khsae chr vea k da thngon ning nork cheu hi m( samreab puokke)
ning chamneiahar da akrak del thveu aoy ke slak haeyning tearounakamm da sen chhucheab themtiet phng
now thngai del phendei ning phnom nung ronhchuoy haey phnom nung klay tow chea pomnouk khsaach del baeng khchatkhchay

pitabrakd nasa yeung ban banhchoun anakneasar mneak( mou ha- meat) towkean puok anak( anak srok mea kkah) del thveuchea saksaei leu puok anak bei dauchchea yeung ban banhchoun anakneasar mneak( mou sa)towkean hvie r aon noh der
haey hvie r aon ban brachheang nung anakneasar noh . dau che neah yeung ban dak tearounakamm ke da thngonthngor
dau che neah tae puok anak ach karpar khluon pi thngai del trong nung thveu aoy ke m ng klaycha saksa ban yeang dauch me dch bae puok anak ban brachheang haey noh
mekh nung bek khe t ch khtei daoysaarte pheap chruolochrabl now thngai noh . karosanyea robsa trong ku trauv ban anouvotd champoh puokke
pitabrakd nasa rueng teangnih kuchea kar romluk muoy . dau che neah anaknea haey chng ruochphot pi tearounakamm ke pitchea chreusareusa yk meakra towkean mcheasa robsa ke cheaminkhan

pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat) doeng tha anak pitchea kraok thvayobangkoum tech cheang pir pheak bei nei peloyb chuonkal peakkandal yb ning chuonkal muoypheakbei nei peloyb . haey muoy krom ampi anak del now cheamuoynung anak ka thveu dauchnaoh der . haey a l laoh kuchea anak kamnt peloyb ning pelothngai . trong ban doeng tha puok anak min ach chhr sa la t penh muoy yb ban laey dau che neah trong ban banthourobanthoy dl puok anak . haey chaur puok anak sautr avei del ngeay sruol ampi kompir kuor an choh . trong kaban doeng der tha nowknongchamnaom puok anak mean anakakhleah nung mean chomngu haey anakakhleah trauv thveudamnaer leu phendei daembi svengork leaphosakkar robsa a l laoh haey anakakhleah tiet tsaou brayoutth knong meakra robsa a l laoh . dau che neah chaur puok anak sautr avei del ngeayosruol ampi vea( kompir kuor an) choh . haey chaur puok anak brate b tde sa lat ning brichcheak hsaa kat ning aoy a l laoh khchei nouv kamchi muoy da laobrapei( brichcheak tropy sa mb tde knong meakra a l laoh) . haey avei del puok anak ban sang samreab khluoneng ampi brakear la noh puok anak nung ttuol ban nouv pheapola brasaer ning phalbony da thomtheng pi a l laoh vinh . haey chaur puok anak som aphytosa pi a l laoh . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
ao anak dandabphuoy( mou ham meat)
chaur anak kraok laeng haey chaur anak dasatuen promean(mnoussa lok ampi tearounakamm robsa a l laoh)
haey chaur anak leukatamkeung mcheasa robsa anak choh
haey chaur anak saamat saamliekbampeak robsa anak
haey chaur anak chiesa aoy chhngay pi ampeu shi ri k
haey chaur anak komaoy avei dl ke daoy anak chngban kar tabasnang chraen mokvinh aoy saoh
haey daembi bampenh batobanhchea nei mcheasa robsa anak chaur anak atthmot
proh nowpel delke phlomtre
ku thngai noh haey chea thngai del lombak bamphot
champoh puok brachheang ku kmean kar ngeayosruol laey
chaur anak( mou ham meat) touk aoy yeung cheamuoynung anak del yeung ban bangkeut ke temnakeng choh
haey yeung ban thveu aoy ke meanotropy sa mb tde chraen sdokasdamph
ning mean kaunchaw del now cheamuoy ke
haey yeung ban thveu aoy ke rsanow yeang sokh sruol
banteabmk ke mean pheap lopholn chngaoy yeung banthem aoy ke tiet
min dauchnaoh te. pitabrakd nasa ke kuchea anak del brachheang rungrousa champoh ayeat robsa yeung
yeung nung thveu aoy ke meantoukkh lombak yeangothngonthngor
proh pitabrakd nasa ke ban sa nhchu ng kit( champoh peaky saamdei robsa mou ham meat) ning ban rieb koumrong thveu akrak
dau che neah ke trauv ban dakbandasa . tae ke rieb koumrong thveu akrak ban yeang dauch me d ch
banteabmk ke trauv ban dakbandasa . tae ke rieb koumrong thveu akrak ban yeang dauch me d ch
banteabmk ke ban pichearna
banteabmk tiet ke ban thveumoukh kranhouv ning khoengmuomaw
kraoyomk ke ban berchenh( pi karpit) ning ban kraeut kr tm themtiet
ruoch ke kaban niyeay tha nih kmeanoavei krawpi m nd akm del ke ttuol ban pi anak chomnean moun noh laey
nih kmeanoavei krawpi peakyasaamdei robsa mnoussa lok laey
haey yeung nung banhchoul ke tow knong nork sa k r
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha nork sa k r chea avei noh
vea min bansaoltouk sach laey haeyka min chaolochhaoeng der
(nork sa k r noh) vea dot sbek mnoussa lok
nowknong nork sa k rnoh mean mea la ai kat dbbram buon roub ( cham thveutearounakamm)

haey yeung minban bangkeut anak karpar nork krawpi mea la- ai kat laey . haey yeung minban bangkeut chamnuon robsa puokke laey leuklengte chea karsaakalbong champoh puok del kmean chomnue bonnaoh daembi aoy banda anak del ban ttuol kompir( puok yeahou ti ning na sa r ni) chuecheak yeang chbasa ning daembi aoy banda anak del mean chomnue meankar chuecheak themtiet ning daembi komaoy anak del ban ttuol kompir ning banda anak del mean chomnue meankar sangsay . ning daembi aoy banda anak del mean chomngu nowknong chetd robsa puokke ning puok del brachheang niyeay tha tae a l laoh mean bamnng avei champoh uteahar teangnih . dau che neah der a l laoh thveu aoy v nge v ng champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea haeyka changaoulobangheanh champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea der . haey kmean norna mneak doengpi chamnuon kangtp nei mcheasa robsa anakakraw pi trong laey haey vea( nork sa k r) ka kmeanoavei krawpi chea kar romluk dl mnoussa lok der
min dauchnaoh te. a l laoh sbath nung preah chnt
ning peloyb nowpel vea ban kanlong phot tow
ning pelopruk nowpel del vea b po ch nh ponlu
pitabrakd nasa vea( nork sa k r) chea brakear muoy da thomtheng
daembi chea karopromean dl mnoussa lok
samreab anaknea del chng chreusareusa meakra chhpaohtow moukh ( daoy daertam meakra troemotrauv) ryy sthetnow khangokraoy(daoy br pru td babakamm)
bokkol krobroub ku trauv ttuolkhosatrauv champoh avei del khluon ban br pru td kanlongomk
leuklengte banda anak del ttuol sievphow khang daisdam bonnaoh
puokke suor knea nowknong thansuokr
ampi puok br pru td babakamm tha
hetoaveibeanchea trong banhchoul puok anak tow knong nork sa k r
puokke ban chhlaey tha puok yeung kalpimoun minban sthet knong chamnaom anak del brate b tde sa la t laey
haey yeung minothleab ban phdal chamneiahar dl anak kreikr laey
haey puok yeung thleab ban niyeay phout kohk cheamuoynung puok del niyeay kohk
haey puok yeung ka thleab ban bdeseth nung thngai barlok
rhaut tealte sechakdeislab ban mokadl puok yeung
haey kar thveu a nd reak m robsa banda anak a nd reak m ku kmean phalobrayoch avei dl puokke laey
dau che neah hetoaveibeanchea puokke ngeak chenhpi kar romluk(kompir kuor an) towvinh
puok teangnoh brieb dauchchea satv lea del phaael
del vea rtkech pi satv tao
phtoytowvinh bokkol krobroub mean bamnng chngaoy ke phdal kompir del rik sosasay( dauch kompir kuor an) der
min dauchnaoh te phtoytowvinh puokke min khlach thngai barlok laey
te. pitabrakd nasa kompir kuor an kuchea kar romluk
dau che neah anaknea haey meanbamnng ke pitchea nung yk vea thveu chea merien
haey puokke min ttuol veay k chea merien laey leukleng te a l laoh mean chetnea bonnaoh . trong kuchea mcheasa del trauv ke kaotakhlach ning chea mcheasa del aphytosa
yeung( a l laoh) sbath nung thngai barlok
haey yeung sbath nung chivit( anak mean chomnue) del meankar saokasday champoh khluoneng
tae mnoussa lok( anak del kmean chomnue) nukasman tha yeung kmean lotthopheap bramoul chhaoeng robsa ke ryy
min dauchnaoh te. tampit yeung chea anak meanolotthopheap krobkrean knong kar rieb sanleakchhaoeng mreamdai mreamcheung robsa ke aoy mean lokkhan penhlenh dauchdaem vinh
phtoytowvinh mnoussa lok nowte mean bamnng chng br pru td babakamm ddel
daoy ke suor tha tae thngai barlok nung kaetlaeng now pelna
nowpel del phnek sraleangkang( daoysaar sthan pheap thngai barlok)
ning preah chnt bat ponlu
haey preahatity ning preah chnt trauv ban ke bramoul
thngai noh mnoussa lok nung niyeay tha tae puok yeung trauv rt tow tinea
te. kmean kanleng rt laey
kanleng vilotralb now thngai noh meante chhpaoh towkean mcheasa robsa anak bonnaoh
now thngai noh mnoussa lok trauv ke brab nouv avei delke ban br pru td kanlongomk ning avei delke minban br pru td
phtoytowvinh mnoussa lok kuchea anak thveusaeaksaei leu khuo l n eng
haey tohbeicha ke ban neamk nouv kar daohsa robsa ke yeang nakadaoy( ka kmean brayoch avei dl ke der)
chaur anak( mou ham meat) kom kamreuk andat robsa anak champoh kar sautr vea prohte branhab t ne t nh vea aoy saoh
pitabrakd nasa yeung chea anakattuol khosatrauv theroksaa vea ( nowknong chetd robsa anak) haey aoy anak statchomneanh knong kar sautr vea
dau che neah nowpel del yeung ban sautr vea( tamory chi pri l) chaur anak trabtam kar sautr robsa vea choh
banteabmk pitabrakd nasa yeung chea anakattuol khosatrauv knong kar bamphlu vea
te. phtoytowvinh puok anak sraleanh chaul chetd karorsanow knong lokey
haey puok anak baohbng thngai barlok
vng phkdr( anak del mean chomnue) now thngai noh ku mean ponlu cheng chang
daoy ban meul towkean mcheasa robsa puokke
rie moukh( anak del kmean chomnue) now thngai noh ku kranhouv
daoy puokke kit yeang chbasa tha ke nung thveutearounakamm puokke yeangothngonthngor
min dauchnaoh te. nowpel del vea( dangheum) ban mokadl bampngk
haey mean ke niyeay tha tae anaknea chea anakapyeabeal ( aoy ruochphot pi sechakdeislab ban)
haey ke ban chue yeang chbasa tha ke pitchea leacheak pi lokey cheaminkhan
haey kamphuoncheung che v ng ban changophcheab nung kamphuoncheung sdam
kanleng vilotralb now thngai noh ku chhpaoh towkean mcheasa robsa anak
haey ke minban chue( leu anakneasar ning kompir kuor an) ning minban sa la t laey
kabonde ke ban bdeseth ning ban berchenh( pi karpit)
banteabmk ke ban tow chuobchoum kruosaear robsa ke daoy uotang
vineasa a nd reay haey anak( anak kmean chomnue) haeyka vineasa a nd reay tiet
banteabmk vineasa a nd reay haey anak( anak kmean chomnue) haeyka vineasa a nd reay tiet
tae mnoussa lok nukasman tha ke baohbngchaol daoy min aepeu ryy
tae ke min bangkeut mnoussa lok ampi muoy tamnk tukkeam delke ban banhchoul tow knong sbaun te ryy
banteabmk ke ka klaytowchea dom chheam haey trong ban bangkeut vea ruoch ka thveu aoy mean roubreang penholokkhan
kraoyomk trong ban bangkeut ampi vea chea kou mean brosa ning srei
tae noh minmen chea anak del meanolotthopheap krobkrean knong kar thveu aoy mnoussa slabrsa laengvinh te ryy
chea karpit nasa rypel da your ban kanlong phot pi mnoussaalok khn del mnoussa lok poum tean kaetmeanlaeng delke min doeng tha vea chea avei saoh noh
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban bangkeut mnoussa lok ampi tamnk tukkeam del leay chauloknea daembi yeung nung sakalbong ke . ruochamk yeung ban thveu aoy ke sdablyy ning meulkheunh
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban changaoulobangheanh ke nouv meakra da troem trauv . ke ach chea anakdoeng koun ryy chea anak rmilkoun
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban riebcham chravak dek ning khnaoh ning nork cheh santhosanthow samreab puok del brachheang
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del sang ampeula ku puokke ttuol tean sra del leay cheamuoy vea ampi tukakraaub au ka hvau r ao
braphp tuk del khnhom robsa a l laoh nung ttuoltean vea nowknong thansuokr puokke ach braebreasa vea tamchamnng chetd
puokke bampenh nouv kar t pv kechch del puokke ban bng( knong kar brate b tde tam a l laoh) haey puokke kaotakhlach thngai muoy del tearounakamm robsa vea realdal krob tikanleng
haey puokke phdal chamneiahar del puokke chaul chetd dl chn kreikr ning kaunkamprea haeyning chhleuysoek

(puokke niyeay knong chetd tha) chea karpit nasa puok yeung phdal chamneiahar dl puok anak daembi svengork kar anet sraleanh robsa a l laoh bonnaoh daoy puok yeung min chngban kar tabasnang ning koun bamnach avei pi puok anak laey
pitabrakd nasa puok yeung kaotakhlach mcheasa robsa puok yeung now thngai muoy del mnea k( nei puok kmean chomnue)moukhakranhouv ning lombak
dau che neah a l laoh ban karpar puokke pi krohakrak nei thngai noh haey ban bratan aoy puokke nouv ponlu da trachahtrachng ning sechakdei rikreay tiet phng
haey trong ban tabasnang dl puokke nouv thansuokr ning saamliek bampeak del thveu ampi sautr daoysaarte avei del puokke ban atthmot
daoy puokke angkouyophaek now leu kawei nowknong thansuokr noh . nowknong noh puokke min trauv kam daw preahatity laey haeyka min rngea der
haey mlob daemchheu robsa vea now chit puokke haey phlechheu robsa vea trauv ke thveu aoy ngeayosruol beh bamphot
haey ke dak now choumvinh puokke daoy saamphear braebreasa del thveu ampi brak ning peng thmakev phlu phe l k
thmakev noh thveu ampi brak del puokke ban kamnt vea yeang sam lmom( samreab ttuoltean tamchamnng chetd robsa puokke)
haey nowknong thansuokr puokke trauv ban ke aoy ttuoltean sra del leay cheamuoy vea nouv rosacheate khnhei
braphp sra nowknong thansuokr noh ke aoyochhmoh tha sal sa hpei l
haey ke m ng del now vy ke m ng chea amt daerchoumvinh(rngcham bamreu) puokke . nowpel del anak( mou ham meat) kheunh puokke anak nung kitthea puokke chea kchkhyang da phlu chengchang
haey nowpel del anak( mou ham meat) kralek meultow tinoh( thansuokr) anak nung kheunh nie k meat krobbebyeang ning amnach da thomtheng

now pi leu khluonobran robsa puokke ku saamliekbampeak thveuampi sautr mdthakhai ning sautr krasa pnrbaitng . haey puokke trauv ban ke bampeak kangdai brak . haey mcheasa robsa puokke ban bratan aoy puokke nouv phesachch da brisotth
pitabrakd nasa nih kuchea kar tabasnang samreab puok anak haey kar kham broengobreng robsa puok anak nung trauv ban ke ttuol yk
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban banhchouh kompir kuor an aoy anak chea damnakkal
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) atthmot champoh bt b nhnh te nei mcheasa robsa anak haey kom brate b tde tam anak del br pru td babakamm ryy anak brachheang knongchamnaom puokke aoy saoh
haey chaur anak romluk neam nei mcheasa robsa anak teang pruk teang lngeach
haey knongamlongpel yb chaur anak saou chout( thvayobangkoum) champoh trong ning leukatamkeung trong nowpel ybchrow
pitabrakd nasa puok teangnoh( puok mou sh ri ki n)sraleanh karorsanow knong lokey haey puokke baohbng thngai del mean pheap vukavr da khlangokla( thngai barlok) dak kraoyokhnang robsa puokke

yeung kuchea anak del ban bangkeut puokke ning ban pongrung reang kay robsa puokke . tebae yeung mean chetnea( bamphlanh puokke) yeung ka ach phlasabdaur krom phe sa ng tiet dauch puokke mk chomnuosa vinh ban der
pitabrakd nasa chompouk nih kuchea kar romluk muoy . dau che neah anaknea haey brathnea chngban la noh ke pitchea chreusareusa meakra tow kan mcheasa robsa ke cheaminkhan
haey puok anak min ach mean bamnng thveuavei muoy ban laey leuklengte a l laoh mean chetnea bonnaoh . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha doeng mha ktebandet
daoy trong nung banhchoul tow knong kdei me tda krounea robsa trong champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea . haey puok del bampean trong ban riebcham samreab puokke nouv tearounakamm da sen chhucheab
a l laoh sbath nung khyal( ryy mea la ai kat) del trauv ke banhchoun mk chea b nd banteab
ning khyalpyouh da khlangokla
ning mea la ai kat del pongreay popk ning tukaphlieng
ning mea la ai kat del bengchek nouv brakear pit ning brakear min pit
ning mea la ai kat del noam sar mk aoy banda anakneasar
daembi bdeseth real kar daohsa ryy chea kardasatuen promean
pitabrakd nasa avei delke sanyea nung puok anak nung kaetlaeng yeang pitabrakd
banteabmk nowpel del hvaung phkay trauv ban ke thveu aoy bat ponlu
haey nowpel del mekh trauv ke thveu aoy bek thlouhthleay
haey nowpel del phnom trauv ke thveu aoy phtoh baeng khe t ch khtei
haey nowpel del banda anakneasar trauv ke bramoul tam kalkamnt
tae banda anakneasar trauv ban ke ponyearpel bramoul rhaut dl thngainea
ku rhautadl thngai katsechakdei
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha thngai vinichchhy chea avei noh
now thngai noh kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del bdeseth nung karpit
tae yeung minban bamphlanh puok chomnean moun( del ban br pru td babakamm) te ryy
banteabmk yeung thveu aoy puok chomnean kraoy vineasa b nd banteab pi puokke tiet
dau che neah der yeung thveu towleu puok br pru td babakamm
now thngai noh kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del bdeseth nung karpit
tae yeung minban bangkeut puok anak ampi tukkeam del kmean tamlei te ryy
kraoyomk yeung ban bangkeut vea nowknong kanleng muoy del mean sovotthephap( nowknong sbaun)
rhautadl pel del trauv ke kamnt da cheakleak
haey yeung ban kamnt(roubreang ning lokkhan robsa mnoussa lok tam del yeung mean chetnea) . dau che neah yeung kuchea anak del kamnt da brasaer bamphot
now thngai noh kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del bdeseth nung karpit
tae yeung minban bangkeut phendei chea kanleng bramoulophdom
teang anak rsa ning anak slab te ryy
haey yeung ban bangkeut phnom khpasa now leu vea ning ban phdal tuk brisotth aoy puok anak
now thngai noh kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del bdeseth nung karpit
(mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha) chaur puok anakdaer tow kan avei( nork) del puok anak thleab ban bdeseth nung vea choh
chaur puok anak daer towkean mlob( phsaeng nei phleung nork) del leat santhung chea bei phnek noh choh
kmean mlob na trachak haeyka kmeanoavei ach karpar pi andat phleung nork ban der
pitabrakd nasa vea cheah phkaphleung laeng khpasa dauchchea vimean
vea( phkaphleung) hakbeidauchchea hvaung satv audth sambour lueng
now thngai noh kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del bdeseth nung karpit
nih kuchea thngai del puokke min ach niyeay ban laey
haey puokke min trauv ke anounhnhat aoy niyeaydaohsa ban laey
now thngai noh kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del bdeseth nung karpit
nih haey kuchea thngai katsechakdei del yeung ban bramoul puok anak ning puok chomnean moun
dau che neah brasenbae puok anak mean lbichakl chaur puok anak rieb lbichakl brachheang nung yeung choh
now thngai noh kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del bdeseth nung karpit
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh ku nowknong mlob cheamuoynung braphp tuk da chraen
ning mean phlechheu krob braphet tam avei del puokke brathnea
(mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha) chaur puok anak briphok ning ttuol daoy kdei rikreay daoysaarte avei del puok anak thleab ban br pru td choh
dau che neah der yeung pitchea nung tabasnang dl banda anak del sang ampeula
now thngai noh kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del bdeseth nung karpit
(mean ke niyeay towkean puok kmean chomnue tha) chaur puok anak briphok ning saoysokh( knong lokey) muoyorypel khlei sen choh proh pitabrakd nasa puok anakchea puok br pru td babakamm
now thngai noh kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del bdeseth nung karpit
haey nowpel del mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha chaur puok anak aon korp( champoh a l laoh)choh puokke bercha min aon korp towvinh
now thngai noh kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del bdeseth nung karpit
dau che neah tae mean peakyasaamdei namuoy banteabpi vea( kompir kuor an) del thveu aoy puokke mean chomnue noh
